name: DEPLETER
description:
DEPLETER is a top down bullet hell shooter where you must walk the fine line between ultimate power and death. You've been stranded on this alien planet for 196 days, and your supplies are running low. But as your health and ammo dwindle, your shots become more powerful. You must carefully manage your resources, and pick your targets wisely, saving that final, devastating round in the chamber for the big bastards.

Controls (Controller Only)

Move - Left Stick

Aim - Right Stick

Shoot - Right Trigger

Swap Health for Ammo - Left Trigger

Dash - A/X (Bottom-most face-button)

DEPLETER was developed in 5 days for Blackthornprod Jam #3 by a team of one; just me. Art, code, design was all my handiwork, unless it's shit then don't blame me. 

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music & Music: https://www.purple-planet.com

Sound Effects: A variety of people on freesound.org
